item.title: BLURB
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" custom_padding="10px||102px|" custom_padding_tablet="10px||50px|" custom_padding_last_edited="on|phone" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" parallax_2="off" parallax_method_2="off" column_padding_mobile="on" custom_padding_phone="10px||30px|" template_type="row"][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="App Design" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" icon_color="#0971f2" use_circle="off" circle_color="#252525" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#0971f2" icon_placement="left" animation="off" text_orientation="left" use_icon_font_size="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_62359-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/blurb2.png" use_button="off" button_type="link" background_color="#ffffff"]

Having designed dozens of applications for either of the platform (iOS; MacOS; Windows; Linux; Android, you name it),I have both the experience and the skills.

[/tm_pb_blurb][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" divider_style="solid" custom_margin="40px|||" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone" custom_margin_tablet="30px|||" custom_margin_phone="20px|||"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Web Design" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" icon_color="#0971f2" use_circle="off" circle_color="#252525" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#0971f2" icon_placement="left" animation="off" text_orientation="left" use_icon_font_size="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_62359-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/blurb1.png" use_button="off" button_type="link" background_color="#ffffff"]

In just about 20 years the world of web design has transformed from a minuscule industry that crafted scary pages with gradient buttons to an industry bigger than.

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Print Design" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" icon_color="#0971f2" use_circle="off" circle_color="#252525" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#0971f2" icon_placement="left" animation="off" text_orientation="left" use_icon_font_size="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_62359-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/blurb3_03.png" use_button="off" button_type="link" background_color="#ffffff"]

The examples include designing some ambient advertising materials for top ad companies on the Madison Avenue, just as well as creating book illustrations.

[/tm_pb_blurb][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" divider_style="solid" custom_margin="40px|||" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone" custom_margin_tablet="30px|||" custom_margin_phone="20px|||"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Branding" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" icon_color="#0971f2" use_circle="off" circle_color="#252525" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#0971f2" icon_placement="left" animation="off" text_orientation="left" use_icon_font_size="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_62359-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/blurb4_03.png" use_button="off" button_type="link" background_color="#ffffff"]

Dreaming of creating unique and appealing visual identities for companies since my high school years, now as some 20 years have passed I am proud.

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row]

Commercial Plumbing

When our hotel's building had all water suddenly shut, we virtually were stopped at all of our business operations... Thanks God there was the "Emergency Plumber" service out there, which helped us out big time!

[/tm_pb_testimonial][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_3"][tm_pb_testimonial admin_label="Testimonial" author="Jane Fairfax" url_new_window="off" portrait_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_62359-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/image45.jpg" quote_icon="on" use_background_color="off" background_color="#f5f5f5" text_orientation="justified" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" font_icon="f10d"]

Kitchen Plumbing

Having some pipe broken and leaking, right in the middle of cooking a family dinner, that's a problem our family had to deal with recently... Thankfully, these plumbers were fast and keen to help us all out!

[/tm_pb_testimonial][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_3"][tm_pb_testimonial admin_label="Testimonial" author="Gerald Cutler" url_new_window="off" portrait_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_62359-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/image46.jpg" quote_icon="on" use_background_color="off" background_color="#f5f5f5" text_orientation="justified" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" font_icon="f10d"]

Outdoors Plumbing

Winter in Wyoming has never been easy... More to that, we've had some of our outdoor pipes frozen. Thankfully, the plumbers whom we called knew what to do and did it in an utmost timely fashion...

[/tm_pb_testimonial][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row]

Plumbing Services

[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Commercial Plumbing" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" icon_color="#0362c4" use_circle="off" circle_color="#1a1a1a" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#0362c4" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_button="off" button_type="link" use_icon_font_size="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_62359-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/image51.png"]

Our plumbing company offers a variety of services for commercial companies. We do Crawl Space Plumbing, Handicap Plumbing & Copper Piping among everything else

[/tm_pb_blurb][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Outdoor Plumbing" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" icon_color="#0362c4" use_circle="off" circle_color="#1a1a1a" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#0362c4" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_button="off" button_type="link" use_icon_font_size="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_62359-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/image52.png"]

When it comes to outdoor pipes or any plumbing fixtures, our company provides timely and cost-efficient assistance when homeowners are experiencing a number

[/tm_pb_blurb][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Emergency Plumber" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" icon_color="#0362c4" use_circle="off" circle_color="#1a1a1a" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#0362c4" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_button="off" button_type="link" use_icon_font_size="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_62359-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/image53.png"]

You simply never know when a faucet may go out of order, a pipe freezes or blows up or a water damage happens. Aware of that factor of surprise, our company works on a

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row]

item.title: BLURB1
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" parallax_2="off" parallax_method_2="off" column_padding_mobile="on" disabled="off" disabled_on="off|off|" padding_1_last_edited="on|desktop" custom_margin="10px|||" template_type="row"][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Educational Programs" url_new_window="off" use_icon="on" icon_color="#ffffff" use_circle="on" circle_color="#ff8ed6" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#0362c4" icon_placement="left" animation="off" text_orientation="left" use_button="off" button_type="link" use_icon_font_size="on" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" font_icon="f12e" icon_font_size="35" circle_size="90"]
Whenever the gender equality is concerned, we can probably all agree that it all starts with our youth - the girls.
[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Equal Pay Program" url_new_window="off" use_icon="on" icon_color="#ffffff" use_circle="on" circle_color="#ff8ed6" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#0362c4" icon_placement="left" animation="off" text_orientation="left" use_button="off" button_type="link" use_icon_font_size="on" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" font_icon="f00b" icon_font_size="35" circle_size="90"]
The United States Constitution does state that it guarantees equal rights and prohibits any kind of discrimination in this country.
[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row]

item.title: BLURB2
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" parallax_2="off" parallax_method_2="off" column_padding_mobile="on" template_type="row"][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="50/50 Congress Goal" url_new_window="off" use_icon="on" icon_color="#ffffff" use_circle="on" circle_color="#ff8ed6" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#0362c4" icon_placement="left" animation="off" text_orientation="left" use_button="off" button_type="link" use_icon_font_size="on" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" font_icon="f201" icon_font_size="35" circle_size="90"]
When we are talking about the Congressional representation that women do have in this country, the words are not enough.
[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Reproductive Rights" url_new_window="off" use_icon="on" icon_color="#ffffff" use_circle="on" circle_color="#ff8ed6" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#0362c4" icon_placement="left" animation="off" text_orientation="left" use_button="off" button_type="link" use_icon_font_size="on" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" font_icon="f080" icon_font_size="35" circle_size="90"]
For centuries and even for the most recent decades, the women's reproductive rights were treated unequally as opposed to those of the men.
[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row]

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" parallax_2="off" parallax_method_2="off" parallax_3="off" parallax_method_3="off" parallax_4="off" parallax_method_4="off" column_padding_mobile="on" template_type="row"][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member admin_label="Person" name="Mary Applebaum" position="Manager" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_62359-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/image28.jpg" animation="off" text_alignment="left" background_layout="dark" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

A Juneau, Alaska native, Mrs. Applebaum has come a long way since her high school graduation all the way up to getting a Brown University Master’s degree in Economics. Talented with the digits, she’s no less successful when it comes to managing the human resources of the company. Ask anyone at our office who is their personal favorite manager...

[/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member admin_label="Person" name="Elisa Hansolo" position="Manager" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_62359-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/image29.jpg" animation="off" text_alignment="left" background_layout="dark" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

Born in New York City, Elisa always felt a strong urge for being an ambitious overachiever. Eventually, by the age of 25 she already had received her first Wall Street executive position, making her one of the youngest managers in the company. With her overall work experience spanning over 2 decades, Mrs. Hansolo is definitely the kind of a senior manager we all...

[/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member admin_label="Person" name="Emily Bluesome" position="Manager" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_62359-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/image30.jpg" animation="off" text_alignment="left" background_layout="dark" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

If you’d ask any of our workers, who is the executive manager that they’re always looking up and living up to, most likely Emily’s name will surface. Having a vast and thorough practical working experience lasting for more than 18 years, Mrs. Bluesome is an ideal manager, who is always on time to handle either our company’s clients or our internal team workflow issues...

[/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member admin_label="Person" name="Diane Beaton" position="Manager" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_62359-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/image31.jpg" animation="off" text_alignment="left" background_layout="dark" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

If you’d ever need to figure out a workaround for a complicated business problem, look no further than Diane’s desk for getting a thorough and all-rounded advice… She has been working in the industry for more than 20 years, knowing all the ins and outs perfectly and teaching each member of our team. Regardless of which exact type of a task does she...

[/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row]

Educational Programs

As someone who was born way back in the 1940s and lived to work in the 1960's, I thoroughly understand how important it is to support the female education and empower the options and opportunities that our young girls should have...

[/tm_pb_testimonial][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_3"][tm_pb_testimonial admin_label="Testimonial" author="Janette Henderson" url_new_window="off" portrait_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_62359-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/image33.jpg" quote_icon="on" use_background_color="off" background_color="#f5f5f5" text_orientation="justified" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" font_icon="f10d"]

Equal Pay Program

Being a witness to how female managers get paid less than their male counterparts in the same department and holding the same positions, on a daily basis, raises my awareness about the equal pay issues. Thankfully, funds like this one do...

[/tm_pb_testimonial][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_3"][tm_pb_testimonial admin_label="Testimonial" author="Mary Blanders" url_new_window="off" portrait_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_62359-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/image34.jpg" quote_icon="on" use_background_color="off" background_color="#f5f5f5" text_orientation="justified" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" font_icon="f10d"]

Reproductive Rights

As someone who is old enough to remember the times before the Roe V. Wade and how incredibly exhausting it was for women back in the day to exercise their harshest reproductive choices and rights, raising awareness about this issue is really something that I...

[/tm_pb_testimonial][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row]

When our hotel's building had all water suddenly shut, we virtually were stopped at all of our business operations... Thanks God there was the "Emergency Plumber" service out there, which helped us out big time!

[/tm_pb_testimonial][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_testimonial admin_label="Testimonial" author="Theresa Buoford" url_new_window="off" portrait_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_62359-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/image49.png" quote_icon="on" use_background_color="off" background_color="#f5f5f5" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" font_icon="f10d"]

As we moved into our new house in North Carolina, we were extremely eager to make sure that the interior of it matches our tastes. This meant, on par with doing some remodeling and renovation works, purchasing a new furniture.

[/tm_pb_testimonial][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row]

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" parallax_2="off" parallax_method_2="off" parallax_3="off" parallax_method_3="off" parallax_4="off" parallax_method_4="off" column_padding_mobile="on" template_type="row"][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member admin_label="Person" name="Alex Buoyega" position="Plumber" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_62359-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/image40.jpg" animation="off" text_alignment="left" background_layout="dark" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

Mr. Buoyega was born in one of Detroit’s poorest blocks, all before pursuing his successful managerial career in the future. For him, the breakthrough happened when he was able to get on Harvard University’s Law School list. After graduating from there, he was working for a few years for a number of multi-million dollar corporations, climbing up the corporate ladder and...

[/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member admin_label="Person" name="Kenneth Richardson" position="Plumber" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_62359-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/image41.jpg" animation="off" text_alignment="left" background_layout="dark" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

A talented and creative leader, Kenneth is known among his colleagues for how good his organizing and team leading skills are… Working priorly for a number of American and International multi-billion dollar companies, Kenneth has built up a reputation and a skillset worthy of an executive manager. His constant focus at work is on...

[/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member admin_label="Person" name="Jonathan Christman" position="Plumber" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_62359-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/image42.jpg" animation="off" text_alignment="left" background_layout="dark" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

Being as a devoted family man as he is, it is incredible how Jonathan has time left for managing multi-million dollar contracts, satisfying all of our clients and managing a vast team of professionals under his command. His resolve is well-known, making him one of the few executive managers in our company who is admired by co-workers. His long stance...

[/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member admin_label="Person" name="Martin Gray" position="Plumber" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_62359-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/image43.jpg" animation="off" text_alignment="left" background_layout="dark" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

Originally from London, at one point of his sophomore college year, Martin decided to turn the tables for his career and travel to the US, to try and get a Harvard MBA degree… Eventually, he succeeded in that, becoming one of the most respected executive managers in his field of work. His 15 years long experience of work in miscellaneous big companies allows him...

[/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row]
